context: I enjoyed the movie Pineapple Express. Can you tell me a couple of the actors? I can't seem to remember.
Sure, I just watched that the other day. I love it, too. James Franco and Danny McBride are in it, as well as Seth Rogen, that guy from Knocked Up.
Can you tell me some other movies Seth Rogan was in...he cracks me up.
resp: Oh yea, he's pretty funny! I know he was one of the writers for Superbad. He was in Step Brothers, he was a voice actor for Kung Fu Panda 2, and he was in This is The End, which is hilarious. And Fan Boys, a silly movie about star wars fans.
